DCFlight Framework ==================
This repository contains the DCFlight framework, a cross-platform mobile development framework built with Dart and Flutter. DCFlight provides a component-based architecture for building native mobile applications with a React-like development experience.
Components included in this license: - DCFlight Core Framework (packages/dcflight) - DCF Primitives Component Library (packages/dcf_primitives) - DCFlight CLI Tools (cli) - Project Templates (packages/template) - Documentation and Examples
Third-party dependencies may be subject to their own licenses. Please refer to the individual package.json, pubspec.yaml, and podspec files for dependency-specific license information.
For more information about DCFlight, visit: https://dotcorr.com
